channel.title: Comments on: A Little Street Team Work

item.title: By: garypiggold
item.dc:creator: garypiggold
item.description: <p><img width="240" height="86" border="0" alt="" src="http://static.flickr.com/41/110997935_44111214c7_m.jpg" /></p><p><< For example, did you know both The Tokens and The Four Seasons each released great, obscure, forgotten psyche-rock albums that rank right up there with Sgt. Pepper and Pet Sounds? Bet you didn't. >><br /> </p><p>And I bet you're talking about The Tokens' AMAZING <em>Intercourse </em>album ??</p><p>Hope so anyways;<br />Coz it truly eats <em>Pepper </em>for breakfast,<br />as they say   ;-)<br /> </p><p>And that's my token comment for the day,</p><p>Gary  "actually sung alongside Jim Carroll on <a href="http://www.artistdirect.com/nad/store/artist/album/0,,193581,00.html" target="_self">a Don Covay Tribute Album</a> once, I kid you knot"  Pig <br /></p><p> </p>
item.content:encoded:
<< For example, did you know both The Tokens and The Four Seasons each released great, obscure, forgotten psyche-rock albums that rank right up there with Sgt. Pepper and Pet Sounds? Bet you didn’t. >>
 

And I bet you’re talking about The Tokens’ AMAZING Intercourse album ??

Hope so anyways;
Coz it truly eats Pepper for breakfast,
as they say   ðŸ˜‰
 

And that’s my token comment for the day,

Gary  "actually sung alongside Jim Carroll on a Don Covay Tribute Album once, I kid you knot"  Pig
